refnamediv.refpurpose: Extract events' values from a biomechanical acquisition

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: times = btkGetEventsValues(h) [times, labels] = btkGetEventsValues(h) [times, labels, descriptions] = btkGetEventsValues(h) [times, labels, descriptions, ids] = btkGetEventsValues(h)

listitem.para: The handle used to represent an acquisition.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para:
Returns matrices containing the n events stored in the acquisition. The output arguments contain the following information:
times: A vector of reals labels: An array of cells descriptions: An array of cells ids: A vector of integers
The acquisition is represented by the handle h. This handle is obtained by the use of a btk* function.
